title: Wereboar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Every new moon, invite someone for a hunt. You will learn their exact subalignment
Every full moon, Invite someone for a feast.

fields.name: Hunting moon ability:
fields.value:
**Feast of the hunt**
You may choose one player you have previously had a feast with and rampage at their house. If another were dies tonight, you will infect your target with lycanthropy, changing their role into the were that died. You may only infect another player once.
